survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with AI-powered support tools, identifying strengths and areas for improvement in automated customer service interactions.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools (e.g., chatbots, virtual assistants)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity. Ensure options cover the full range of interaction frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools (e.g., chatbots, virtual assistants)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered support tools have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an option for users who haven't used any tools.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered support tools have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your overall experience using AI-powered customer support tools? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with clear labels for each point. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your overall experience using AI-powered customer support tools? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What do you consider the biggest advantage of AI-powered customer support tools?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE).

answer_options: Limited ability to handle complex issues
Frustrating when unable to understand queries

answer_options: Limited ability to handle complex issues

questions.question_text: In what situations do you prefer AI-powered support over human customer service representatives?
answer_options: When I don't want to wait on hold

answer_options: No, I expect good support as standard
No, I prefer human support regardless
